features: 2-way adjustable hood is crafted with extra down-fill for added softness and warmth around the head and neck. Brim has a shaping wire and a removable fur ruff to protect your skin from harsh winds
Overstuffed collar adds warmth and insulation while chin guard is lined with tricot fabric for added softness and comfort

360° Reflectivity: Reflective webbing along the back of the hood adds visibility in low light. Outer cuffs feature reflective detailing that can be hidden with single button adjustment when not needed
Interior backpack straps allow jacket to be carried hands-free over the shoulders
Recessed rib-knit cuffs with thumbhole construction add comfort and lock in heat
Articulated sleeves and underarm gussets enhance fit and add range of motion
Placket with snap closures over 2-way zipper keeps the elements out. Unzip from the bottom for added range of motion or venting
Stowable D-Ring at wearer's left can be used to attach gloves or other necessities and hidden when not needed
3 exterior pockets: secure zipper pocket underneath placket, 2 fleece-lined hand warmer pockets with hidden snap closures
